GSD.description:
udmabuf: Set the DMA mask for the udmabuf device (v2)

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.212 by commit 63d8c1933ed280717f934e2bc2edd869bb66f329. For more details please see the references link.
